text: Nɨ God Moses ganɨngizir arazim gɨfo, ‘Nɨ gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ, nɨ poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuam markɨ, nɨ gumazir igharazimɨn biziba okɨman markɨ, nɨ bizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ ua bagh biziba inisɨ gumazibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn apengan ikɨ aningɨn akaba baragh.’”
